entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries changing to a few flurries this evening and ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 24 April 2023
